upgradeDescriptions.1: [1x1] Du hast es! +16,666% 3D Würfel durchs Aufsteigen pro Level.
upgradeDescriptions.2: [1x2] Plutus grants you +3 Salvage per level!
upgradeDescriptions.3: [1x3] Athena gewährt dir +10% mehr Obtainium, und +80% Auto Obtainium pro Level.
upgradeDescriptions.4: [1x4] Du behältst diese 5 nützlichen Automatisierungs-Upgrades im Reiter für Upgrades!
upgradeDescriptions.5: [1x5] You keep the Mythos upgrade automation upgrade in the upgrades tab!
upgradeDescriptions.6: [1x6] You keep the automatic "Mythos gain" upgrade in the upgrades tab!
upgradeDescriptions.7: [1x7] Automatically buy each Particle building whenever possible.
upgradeDescriptions.9: [1x9] The Research automator in shop now automatically buys cheapest when enabled. It's like a roomba kinda!
upgradeDescriptions.10: [1x10] Schalte einige Werkzeuge frei um Aufstiege zu automatisieren oder so. Ziemlich teuer aber cool.
upgradeDescriptions.11: [2x1] Du hast es schon wieder! +9,09% 3D Würfel durchs Aufsteigen pro Level.
upgradeDescriptions.12: [2x2] Raise Building Power to the power of (1 + level * 0.09).
upgradeDescriptions.13: [2x3] For each 20 Cubes opened at once, you get 1 additional Tribute at random.
upgradeDescriptions.14: [2x4] Iris shines her light on you. Each level increases the amount of Salvage she gives by 1%!
upgradeDescriptions.15: [2x5] Ares teaches you the Art of War. The effect of Ares Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.16: [2x6] You got it buster! For Speed and Prism Runes, add +1 to their Rune Coefficients per level!
upgradeDescriptions.17: [2x7] Yep. +5 exponent per level to crystals.
upgradeDescriptions.19: [2x9] Unlocks new Coin upgrades ranging from start of Ascend to after Challenge 10 and beyond.
upgradeDescriptions.20: [2x10] The Rune automator in shop now spends all Offerings automatically, splitting them into unlocked runes evenly. It also buys levels 20 times faster. Have fun!
upgradeDescriptions.21: [3x1] Perhaps Score will benefit you more? Gain +5% more Ascension Score per level.
upgradeDescriptions.22: [3x2] Te effect of Artemis Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.23: [3x3] For each 20 Cubes opened at once, you get 1 additional Tribute at random.
upgradeDescriptions.24: [3x4] Plutus teaches you the Art of the Deal. The effect of his Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.25: [3x5] Moloch lends you a hand in communicating with Ant God. The effect of his Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.26: [3x6] Start Ascensions with enough EXP for 3 Rune Levels per level (may actually be more or less depending on Rune Coefficient). Only affects the first five Runes.
upgradeDescriptions.27: [3x7] Nach einem Aufstieg wirst du mit 1 von jedem Reinkarnations-Gebäude beginnen, um den Aufstieg zu beschleunigen.
upgradeDescriptions.28: [3x8] Nun, ich glaube, du hast es? Erhalte pro Sekunde +1% der Partikel die du durch Reinkarnation bekommen würdest.
upgradeDescriptions.29: [3x9] Füge pro Level +4 zum Abschlusslimit der Reinkarnations-Herausforderungen hinzu. Nach 25 Abschlüssen skalieren die Anforderung schneller!
upgradeDescriptions.30: [3x10] Du erhältst jetzt +40% Würfel und Tesserakte für immer!
upgradeDescriptions.31: [4x1] You again? +5% more Ascension Score per level.
upgradeDescriptions.32: [4x2] Erhalte jede Sekunde +0,1% der Runen EXP die du in diesem Aufstieg ausgegeben hast!
upgradeDescriptions.33: [4x3] For each 20 Cubes opened at once, you get yet another additional Tribute at random.
upgradeDescriptions.34: [4x4] Chronos overclocks the universe for your personal benefit. The effect of Chronos Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.35: [4x5] Aphrodite increases the fertility of your coins. The effect of Aphrodite Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.36: [4x6] Raise Building Power to (1 + 0.05 * Level) once more.
upgradeDescriptions.37: [4x7] For Thrift and Superior Intellect runes, add +1 to the Rune Level Coefficient per level!
upgradeDescriptions.38: [4x8] Gain +0.5% more Tesseracts on Ascension for each additional level in a Corruption you enable.
upgradeDescriptions.39: [4x9] Instead of the Ascension Score multiplier being 1.03^(C10 completions), it is now 1.035^(C10 completions)!
upgradeDescriptions.40: [4x10] Athena is very smart. The effect of Athena Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.41: [5x1] Yeah yeah yeah, +5% Ascension Score per level. Isn't it enough?
upgradeDescriptions.42: [5x2] You now gain +4% Immaculate Obtainium per level, which is not dependent on corruptions!
upgradeDescriptions.43: [5x3] Gain another +3% Immaculate Obtainium per level.
upgradeDescriptions.44: [5x4] Blah blah blah Midas works harder. The effect of Midas Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.45: [5x5] Blah blah blah Hermes works harder. The effect of Hermes Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.48: [5x8] When you ascend, start with 1 Worker Ant (this is a lot better than it sounds!)
upgradeDescriptions.49: [5x9] Wenn du aufsteigst, erhalte 1 Abschluss von Herausforderung 6-8.
upgradeDescriptions.50: [5x10] What doesn't this boost? +0.01% Accelerators, Multipliers, Accelerator Boosts, +0.02% Obtainium, +0.02% Offerings, +1 Effective ELO, 0.00066% Tax reduction per level. Every 10,000 levels grant +0.6% Talisman Power!
upgradeDescriptions.51: [Cx1] Wow! Bakery is open!!! Immediately unlock all automations in the Wow! Cubes tab, and Research as well.
upgradeDescriptions.52: [Cx2] These sugar cookies sure boost your blood sugar. Gain +1% Global Speed per level.
upgradeDescriptions.53: [Cx3] Was für einen herzhafter Snack. Erhalte +0,1% Quarks pro Level.
upgradeDescriptions.54: [Cx4] Pretty dry, but they suffice. Gain +1% Offerings per level.
upgradeDescriptions.55: [Cx5] An inventive take on the original chip cookie. Gain +1% Obtainium per level.
upgradeDescriptions.56: [Cx6] Diese sind ein wenig exotischer. Erhalte +1 mehr direkte Punkte durch Abschießen von Challenge 1 pro Level.
upgradeDescriptions.57: [Cx7] Yum yum! Das hört sich schon besser an... oder auch nicht. Erhöhe die Obergrenze von Würfel-Upgrades 1x1, 2x1, 3x1, 4x1, 5x1 um 1.
upgradeDescriptions.58: [Cx8] Ein bisschen festlich! Bei Events werden alle Würfelgewinne mit 1,25 multipliziert.
upgradeDescriptions.59: [Cx9] Quite sour for a cookie. But it increases your Ascension Speed by +0.25% per level, so who is to complain?
upgradeDescriptions.60: [Cx10] Wow! Die Bäckerei hatte extra Ingwer aus ihrem Weihnachtsverkauf. Reduziert die Kosten für den Kauf von Goldenen Quarks um 0,003% pro Level.
upgradeDescriptions.61: [Cx11] Edible but prone to mistakes. Adds 125 whole milliseconds to the tolerance of code 'time', and increases its reward by +2% per level.
upgradeDescriptions.62: [Cx12] Platonic loves toffee. 8x your Obtainium and Offering gain in Challenge 15.
upgradeDescriptions.63: [Cx13] Brownie Cookies, the best of both worlds. Increase 3D Cube Gain by 1% based on owned Hepteracts (+3% per OOM).
upgradeDescriptions.64: [Cx14] Manche sagen, dass der Ameisengott selbst diese Schätzte geschrieben hat. Wenn du eine Statue von Platonischen Würfeln erhältst, erhältst du stattdessen zwei.
upgradeDescriptions.65: [Cx15] That's amore, but is quite a crumbful! Multiply Ant Speed by 1.004 per purchased Ant.
upgradeDescriptions.66: [Cx16] Du wünschst du könntest einen weiteren Keks haben, den sie gebacken hat. Verdoppelt alle Würfel bis zum Kauf von OMEGA.
upgradeDescriptions.67: [Cx17] Was zur Hölle ist da drin??? Wie auch immer, Metaphysik-Talisman Levellimit wird um 1,337 erhöht.
upgradeDescriptions.68: [Cx18] Was zum Teufel! Das sind nicht einmal Kekse. +0.01% Quarks pro Level und +5% mehr auf Level 1.000!
upgradeDescriptions.69: [Cx19] Kekse, an die du dich nie wieder erinnerst. +12% Goldene Quarks diese Singularität.
upgradeDescriptions.70: [Cx20] The pinnacle of baking. Nothing you'll eat will taste better than this. Gain +0.01% more Octeracts per level on Ascension if the average level of your Corruptions is at least 14.
upgradeDescriptions.71: [Cx21] For each Talisman Rarity, multiply Obtainium gain by 1.04.
upgradeDescriptions.72: [Cx22] For each Talisman Rarity, multiply Offering gain by 1.04.
upgradeDescriptions.73: [Cx23] Each level adds 1 bonus level to the Infinite Ascent rune!
upgradeDescriptions.74: [Cx24] Add +0.30 to all Corruption Multiplier values.
upgradeDescriptions.75: [Cx25] Each level adds +0.3% effectiveness to free Golden Quark upgrades per level! (additive with all other boosts)
upgradeDescriptions.76: [Cx26] Each level gives <<lightblue | +1% Ambrosia Bar Points >> for each time threshold you have reached!
upgradeDescriptions.78: [Cx28] Each level adds +0.3% effectiveness to free Octeract Upgrades per level!
upgradeDescriptions.79: [Cx29] Gain Ambrosia Luck when this upgrade is purchased, based on your Lifetime Red Ambrosia! [Formula is 10 * (Log_10(x))^2]
upgradeDescriptions.80: [Cx30] You intercept a singular message: <<gray|'Why don't you visit more often?'>>...

cubeMetadata.maxLevel: Kosten: 0 Wow! Würfel. Dieses Upgrade ist maximiert! Wow

cubes.howManyCubesOpen:
Wie viele Würfel möchtest du öffnen? Du hast {{x}}! 
Du kannst einen Prozentsatz von Würfel zum Öffnen angeben, zum Beispiel: "50%" oder "100%". 
Du kannst die Eingabe mit "-" starten (einen negativen Wert) um festzulegen wie viele Würfel nicht geöffnet werden sollen, was bedeutet, dass alle Würfel außer der angegebenen Zahl geöffnet werden (funktioniert auch mit %).

validation.notEnough: Du hast nicht genügend Würfel zum Öffnen!
validation.negative: Du kannst keine negative Menge Würfel öffnen.
validation.invalidPercent: Du kannst {{x}}% deiner Würfel nicht öffnen...

calculate.timePrompt: Wie weit möchtest du in Zukunft in die Zukunft reisen? Wenn die Testsaison beginnt, ist alles möglich.
calculate.timePromptError: Hey! Das ist keine gültige Zeit!
calculate.offlineEarnings: Offline verdienten sich die Idle Overlords:
calculate.cubicSumNegativeError: Du kannst keine negativen Menge ausgeben!

descriptions.1: [1x1] Erhöhe die Anzahl der kostenlosen Beschleuniger von allen Quellen um 20%.
descriptions.2: [1x2] Erhöhe die Anzahl der kostenlosen Multiplikatoren von allen Quellen um 20%.
descriptions.3: [1x3] Erhöhe die Anzahl der kostenlosen Beschleuniger-Boosts von allen Quellen um 20%.
descriptions.4: [1x4] +10% Rune Power to the first five Runes! (Yes, there are more than five runes)
descriptions.5: [1x5] Multipliziert die Produktion aller Kristallhersteller mit 1e4.
descriptions.21: [1x21] +1% Rune Power to the first five Runes per level.
descriptions.22: [1x22] Jede genutzte Gabe erhöht Runen EXP um 0,6 pro Level.
descriptions.23: [1x23] Jede genutzte Gabe erhöht Runen EXP um weitere 0,3 pro Level!
descriptions.24: [1x24] Increase your Base Offerings by 0.4 per level.
descriptions.25: [1x25] Increase your Base Offerings by 0.6 per level.
descriptions.26: [2x1] Multipliziere die Produktion aller Kristallproduzenten mit 150% pro Level (Multiplikativ).
descriptions.27: [2x2] Multipliziere die Produktion aller Kristallproduzenten mit 150% pro Level (Multiplikativ).
descriptions.28: [2x3] Münzexponent wird um 0,08 pro Level erhöht.
descriptions.29: [2x4] Münzexponent wird um weitere 0,08 pro Level erhöht.
descriptions.30: [2x5] Münzexponent wird um WEITERE 0,04 pro Level erhöht.
descriptions.31: [2x6] Möchtest du stattdessen Kekse backen? Du kannst pro Level 4 zusätzliche Stunden offline gehen (Basis 72hr).
descriptions.32: [2x7] Willst du stattdessen viele Kekse backen? Erhöht die maximale Zeit für Offline-Fortschritt pro Level um weitere 4 Stunden!
descriptions.33: [2x8] Erhalte pro Level +11% mehr Multiplikator-Boosts durch Mythos Splitter.
descriptions.34: [2x9] Erhalte pro Level weitere +11% mehr Multiplikator-Boosts durch Mythos Splitter.
descriptions.35: [2x10] Erhalte pro Level WEITERE +11% mehr Multiplikator-Boosts durch Mythos Splitter.
descriptions.36: [2x11] Gebäudekraft skaliert um 5% schneller pro Level.
descriptions.37: [2x12] Gebäudekraft skaliert um 2.5% schneller pro Level.
descriptions.38: [2x13] Gebäudekraft skaliert um 2.5% schneller pro Level.
descriptions.39: [2x14] Die Gebäudekraft beeinflusst die Kristallproduktion mit reduzierter Geschwindigkeit.
descriptions.40: [2x15] Die Gebäudekraft beeinflusst die Mythos Splitterproduktion mit reduzierter Geschwindigkeit.
descriptions.41: [2x16] Start Reincarnations with automatic A.Boosts unlocked. Note: this Research doesn't affect earning achievements.
descriptions.46: [2x21] Schalte die Fähigkeit frei, automatisch zu Reinkarnieren!
descriptions.47: [2x22] Schaltet Reinkarnations-Upgrade 1-5 frei. [Upgrades kosten zwischen 1 und 1.000 Teilchen]
descriptions.48: [2x23] Schaltet Reinkarnations-Upgrade 6-10 frei. [Upgrades kosten zwischen 100.000 und 1e22 Teilchen]
descriptions.49: [2x24] Schaltet Reinkarnations-Upgrade 11-15 frei. [Upgrades kosten zwischen 1e30 und 1e60 Teilchen]
descriptions.50: [2x25] Schaltet Reinkarnations-Upgrade 16-20 frei. [Möglicherweise solltest du warten bis Herausforderung 8 machbar ist!]
descriptions.51: [3x1] Steuern skalieren 5,0% langsamer pro Level. [Bis zu -50%]
descriptions.52: [3x2] Steuern skalieren 2,5% langsamer pro Level. [Bis zu -75%]
descriptions.53: [3x3] Steuern skalieren 1,25% langsamer pro Level. [Bis zu -87.5%]
descriptions.54: [3x4] Steuern skalieren 0,625% langsamer pro Level. [Bis zu -93.75%]
descriptions.55: [3x5] Steuern skalieren 0,3125% langsamer pro Level. [Bis zu -96.875%]
descriptions.56: [3x6] Gebäudekostenskalierung wird pro Level um 0,5% verzögert.
descriptions.57: [3x7] Gebäudekostenskalierung wird pro Level um 0,5% verzögert.
descriptions.58: [3x8] Gebäudekostenskalierung wird pro Level um 0,5% verzögert.
descriptions.59: [3x9] Gebäudekostenskalierung wird pro Level um 0,5% verzögert.
descriptions.60: [3x10] Gebäudekostenskalierung wird pro Level um 0,5% verzögert.
descriptions.61: [3x11] Erhalte +50% deines besten Obtainium pro Sekunde AUTOMATISCH!
descriptions.62: [3x12] Erhalte zusätzlich +10% deines besten Obtainium pro Sekunde automatisch.
descriptions.63: [3x13] If your Reincarnation lasts at least 2 seconds you gain +1 Base Obtainium per level.
descriptions.64: [3x14] If your Reincarnation lasts at least 5 seconds you gain +2 Base Obtainium per level.
descriptions.65: [3x15] Gain +20% more Obtainium per level. Quite simple!
descriptions.66: [3x16] Erhöht die maximale Anzahl von [Keine Multiplikatoren] Abschlüssen um 5 pro Level.
descriptions.67: [3x17] Erhöht die maximale Anzahl von [Keine Beschleuniger] Abschlüssen um 5 pro Level.
descriptions.68: [3x18] Erhöht die maximale Anzahl von [Keine Splitter] Abschlüssen um 5 pro Level.
descriptions.69: [3x19] Erhöht die maximale Anzahl von [Kosten+] Abschlüssen um 5 pro Level.
descriptions.70: [3x20] Erhöht die maximale Anzahl von [Reduzierte Diamanten] Abschlüssen um 5 pro Level.
descriptions.71: [3x21] Du bekommst automatisch Abschlüsse für Herausforderung 1 während Reinkarnationsherausforderungen
descriptions.72: [3x22] Du bekommst automatisch Abschlüsse für Herausforderung 2 während Reinkarnationsherausforderungen
descriptions.73: [3x23] Du bekommst automatisch Abschlüsse für Herausforderung 3 während Reinkarnationsherausforderungen
descriptions.74: [3x24] Du bekommst automatisch Abschlüsse für Herausforderung 4 während Reinkarnationsherausforderungen
descriptions.75: [3x25] Du bekommst automatisch Abschlüsse für Herausforderung 5 während Reinkarnationsherausforderungen
descriptions.76: [4x1] Here's +10% Obtainium per level to help you afford these next Researches!
descriptions.77: [4x2] Here's +1 Rune Coefficient to Speed Rune, per level!
descriptions.78: [4x3] Here's +1 Rune Coefficient to Duplication Rune, per level!
descriptions.79: [4x4] Here's +1 Rune Coefficient to Prism Rune, per level!
descriptions.80: [4x5] Here's +1 Rune Coefficient to Thrift Rune, per level!
descriptions.81: [4x6] You thought the previous Researches are expensive? You're going to need this! [+10% Obtainium per level]
descriptions.82: [4x7] Permanently UNLOCK the Rune of Superior Intellect! [Bonuses: Offerings, Obtainium and Ant Speed]
descriptions.83: [4x8] Taking forever to level up that new Rune? Here's +5% Superior Intellect Rune EXP per level.
descriptions.84: [4x9] Does the Superior Intellect Rune kinda suck? Power it up! +0.5% Rune Power only for SI Rune per level!
descriptions.85: [4x10] Erhalte pro Level +0.01% mehr Gaben pro Herausforderungsabschluss!
descriptions.86: [4x11] Yeah, going back to basics. +5% Accelerators per level.
descriptions.88: [4x13] -1/5 A.Boosts SUCK: +5% Accelerator Boosts per level.
descriptions.89: [4x14] -5/5 MULTIPLIERS STILL SUCK: +20% Multiplier Boosts per level
descriptions.90: [4x15] Runes don't suck at all, but why not make them even BETTER? +1% Rune Power per level!
descriptions.91: [4x16] A simple +5% Rune EXP for all Runes!
descriptions.92: [4x17] Another simple +5% Rune EXP for all Runes!
descriptions.93: [4x18] +1 Accelerator Boost per 20 Rune Levels, per level.
descriptions.94: [4x19] +20 Multiplier per 8 Rune Levels, per level.
descriptions.95: [4x20] Gain +4 base Offerings from by purchasing this. Easy Shmeezy.
descriptions.96: [4x21] Ants slow? Multiply Ant Speed by 1.0002 per Ant purchased.
descriptions.97: [4x22] Add +4 free levels to the first six upgradable Ants per level!
descriptions.98: [4x23] Add +4 free levels to the next five upgradable Ants per level!
descriptions.99: [4x24] Ist der Quarkmarkt zu verlockend, um ihn zu widerstehen? Erhalte für jedes Level +1 Quark pro Stunde vom Export!
descriptions.100: [4x25] Alright, Platonic is off his rocker. +1 MORE Quark per hour from Exporting for each level!
descriptions.101: [5x1] Let's add +.001 to Inceptus Ant efficiency per level?
descriptions.102: [5x2] Gain +1 free level to ALL Ants per level! A rainbow attack!
descriptions.103: [5x3] Pray to Ant God for +5% Ant Sacrifice rewards per level!
descriptions.104: [5x4] You're beginning to feel like an Ant God (Ant God): +5% Ant Sacrifice reward per level!
descriptions.105: [5x5] Buy this and be able to run the first five Challenges up to 9,001 times! (Note that requirements scale a LOT faster after 75, and again after 1,000)
descriptions.106: [5x6] Engrave your talismans with Obtainium to get +0.1% Talisman Power per level (increases the amount of free levels you get for Runes)!
descriptions.107: [5x7] Refine your talismans with the powder of Obtainium to get +0.1% Talisman Power per level, again!
descriptions.108: [5x8] Ein einfacher Trick erhöht deinen Ameisen ELO Basiswert pro Level um 25!
descriptions.109: [5x9] Ein verwirrender Trick erhöht deine deinen Ameisen ELO Basiswert pro Level um weitere 25!
descriptions.110: [5x10] Gain +1% more Ant ELO from Ant sources per level because why not?
descriptions.111: [5x11] Here's another +1 Rune Coefficient to Speed Rune, per level!
descriptions.112: [5x12] Here's another +1 Rune Coefficient to Duplication Rune, per level!
descriptions.113: [5x13] Here's another +1 Rune Coefficient to Prism Rune, per level!
descriptions.114: [5x14] Here's another +1 Rune Coefficient to Thrift Rune, per level!
descriptions.115: [5x15] Here's +1 Rune Coefficient to Superior Intellect Rune, per level! I realize you didn't have an earlier Research for this, so this has twice as many levels.
descriptions.116: [5x16] Gain yet another +0.1% Talisman Power per level! (Unlike Rune Power, Talisman Power is additive across all sources. Don't ask why.)
descriptions.117: [5x17] Incredibly, gain another +0.1% Talisman Power per level!
descriptions.118: [5x18] Try this for size: gain +0.2% Talisman Power per level! It's like twice as good as the other upgrades.
descriptions.119: [5x19] Bekomme pro Level +0,25% Wow! Würfel beim Aufstieg.
descriptions.120: [5x20] Bekomme pro Level weiter +0,25% Wow! Würfel beim Aufstieg.
descriptions.121: [5x21] Bend (global) time to your will, gaining +2% Global Speed per level.
descriptions.124: [5x24] Unlock the automator for Ant Sacrifice!
descriptions.125: [5x25] Viel Glück, Kumpel. [+1 Export Quark/Stunde pro Level]
descriptions.126: [6x1] 6 rows? That can't be... (+1% Accelerators / level)
descriptions.129: [6x4] Füge +1 gratis Level zu Kristallupgrade-Maximallevel hinzu, multipliziert mit Level * Log4(Gewöhnliche Fragmente + 1)
descriptions.130: [6x5] Unlock automation for leveling Talismans! Activates every 2 real life seconds.
descriptions.131: [6x6] Turn some Ant Disciples against Ant God, giving +0.5% Rune Power per level. False prophets, or false profits?
descriptions.132: [6x7] Recruit a couple other Ants towards your side as well, giving +2 free Ant upgrade levels per level.
descriptions.133: [6x8] Using some coalesced Obtainium, you can make Ant Sacrifice +3% more bountiful per level.
descriptions.134: [6x9 lol] The funny number. Gain a +6.9% bonus to Blessing Power.
descriptions.135: [6x10] Makes it so that the Talisman autobuyer automatically buys to Rarity increase!
descriptions.136: [6x11] It may be time to look back. Increase your Global Speed by +1.5% per level.
descriptions.137: [6x12] Wenn du die Wow! Industrie finanzierst sponsern sie dir +1% Würfel pro Level für deine Aufstiegsbank.
descriptions.138: [6x13] When you open Wow! Cubes you will get +0.1% Tributes per level!
descriptions.139: [6x14] Lasse all Tesseraktgebäude pro Level 2% schneller produzieren.
descriptions.140: [6x15] The first of a tetralogy, this tome reduces the base requirements of Challenge 10 by dividing it by 1e100M! A must-read!
descriptions.141: [6x16] The Ant God has infiltrated your mind. Run away from your conscience! +0.8% Accelerators per level
descriptions.142: [6x17] Run... RUN FASTER from your nightmares! +0.8% Accelerator Boosts per level
descriptions.143: [6x18] Your resilience somehow gives you +0.8% Multipliers per level!
descriptions.144: [6x19] Deine Obtainiumproduktion is um 3 * Log4(Ungewöhnliche Fragmente + 1) * Level% erhöht! Warum? Weiß ich auch nicht.
descriptions.145: [6x20] Dein Wissen aus dem Ameisenkrieg wird dir helfen automatisch Mortuus Est Ameisenlevels zu bekommen.
descriptions.146: [6x21] Feed your Disciples pure Obtainium to make them produce +0.4% Rune Power (to the first five runes) per level.
descriptions.147: [6x22] Füttere deine Ameisen mit ihren eigenen Krümeln um sie Log(Krümel + 10)x schneller zu machen!
descriptions.148: [6x23] Erhöhe deinen Ameisen ELO Basiswert um 2.5% pro Level!
descriptions.149: [6x24] Du wirst pro Level +0.03% mehr Gaben pro Midas-Talismanlevel erhalten!
descriptions.150: [6x25] Auto Challenge. Enough said. Lets you automatically run and complete Challenges!
descriptions.151: [7x1] A new row, old upgrade. Increase your Global Speed by +1.2% per level.
descriptions.152: [7x2] Wow! Industrien sponsern weitere +0,9% Würfel pro Level zu deiner Aufstieg Bank!
descriptions.153: [7x3] Hey, I totally didn't steal this idea. You gain 12 Tributes of Wow! Cube tier for every Tesseract opened.
descriptions.154: [7x4] Make all Tesseract buildings produce 3% faster per level. Hey, isn't that more than the last Research tier?
descriptions.155: [7x5] Band 2 von 4: Wie man das Ameisen-Universum gewinnt. Ein weiterer e100M Divisor zur Herausforderung 10 Basis-Anforderung beim Kauf.
descriptions.156: [7x6] What, again? Alright. +0.6% Accelerators per level.
descriptions.157: [7x7] Gas, gas, gas. +0.6% Accelerator Boosts per level.
descriptions.158: [7x8] Dupe DUPE DUPE. +0.6% Multipliers per level.
descriptions.159: [7x9] Somehow, I can't explain why, you reduce your Taxes by 2% multiplicative, based on 3/5 * log10(Rare Fragments)!
descriptions.160: [7x10] Want a permanent Blessing boost? I know you do. A permanent +25% Blessing Power increase.
descriptions.161: [7x11] SIGMA KAPPA: +0.3% Rune Power each level!
descriptions.162: [7x12] Mehr exponentiales! +0.0001% mehr Inceptus-Kraft pro Level!
descriptions.163: [7x13] Der Ameisengott will Blut sehen: +2% Ameisenopferungsbelohnung / Level
descriptions.164: [7x14] Spirits suck, so add +8% Spirit Power per level!
descriptions.165: [7x15] Gain 2x Spirit Power in Ascension Challenges!
descriptions.166: [7x16] < T I M E >: +0.9% Global Speed per level.
descriptions.167: [7x17] Because of sponsorships, Wow! Industries is increasing Cubes gained in Ascension by 0.8% per level.
descriptions.168: [7x18] Gain +0.08% Tributes from Cubes per level. You know, you should expect it at this point.
descriptions.170: [7x20] Band 3 von 4: Wie man Herausforderung 10 richtig ROCKT. e100m Divisor!
descriptions.171: [7x21] You should know how this goes. +0.4% Accelerators per level
descriptions.174: [7x24] Epic Fragments boost Blessing Power by +10% * Log10(Epic Shards + 1)
descriptions.175: [7x25] Automatically buy Constant Upgrades, if they are affordable! They also no longer subtract from your Constant.
descriptions.176: [8x1] Row 8 baby! +0.2% Rune Power per level.
descriptions.177: [8x2] +Log10(Crumbs)% to Ant Speed per level. Pretty cool buff ain't it?
descriptions.178: [8x3] +666 Basis-ELO pro Stufe! Die Zahl des Teufels, wie unheimlich.
descriptions.179: [8x4] +0.04% more Offerings per level per Midas Talisman level!
descriptions.180: [8x5] +1 Export-Quark pro Stunde, pro Stufe - schon wieder.
descriptions.181: [8x6] +0.6% Global Speed per level because why not? You're already the speed of light.
descriptions.182: [8x7] +0.7% Cubes in Ascension bank per level, from dividends in Wow! Stock.
descriptions.183: [8x8] Wenn du einen Hypercube öffnest, öffnest du auch 100 Tesserakte! (Das funktioniert auch mit 7x3, falls du dich gefragt hast.)
descriptions.184: [8x9] +5% faster Tesseract Buildings per level. ASCENDED.
descriptions.185: [8x10] Tome 4 of 4: How to Train your Ascendant. e100m divisor!
descriptions.186: [8x11] Something something +0.2% Accelerators per level... pretty cool!
descriptions.187: [8x12] Something somewhere, +0.2% Accelerator Boosts per level.
descriptions.188: [8x13] You are a DUPLICATE. +0.2% Multipliers per level
descriptions.189: [8x14] Legendary Fragments increase Spirit Power by +15% * Log10(Legendary Fragments + 1)
descriptions.190: [8x15] Schaltet Automatisierung für all 5 Tesseraktgebäude frei.
descriptions.192: [8x17] Each purchased level of Mortuus Est (the Ant Upgrade) also increases Ascension Cube reward by +0.03%
descriptions.194: [8x19] Increases both Spirit Power AND Blessing Power by +2% per level.
descriptions.195: [8x20] Erhalte beim Export +1 Quarks pro Level und die maximale Zeit zum Sammeln von Quarks wird jeweils um 5 Stunden erhöht!
descriptions.196: [8x21] +0.3% Global Speed per level. Faster than the speed of light?
descriptions.197: [8x22] +0.6% Cubes in Ascension Bank per level. No one knows how. Bank error perhaps.
descriptions.198: [8x23] +0.06% Tributes from Cubes per level! Wow! Cubes really has a lot of manufacturing errors in your favor.
descriptions.199: [8x24] +10% faster Tesseract Buildings / level. THE ARISEN. WITH THE PRAISE OF THE [[REDACTED]].
descriptions.200: [8x25] Gain the power of a thousand suns! +0.01% Accelerators, A. Boosts, Multipliers, Offerings per level. +0.004% Cubes per level, +(level/200) free Ant upgrade levels, 0.000666% Tax reduction per level. Every 10,000 levels grant +0.4% more Talisman Power!

researches.thanksToResearches: Thanks to Research you automatically gain {{x}} Obtainium per real life second.
researches.hover: Hover over the grid to get details about Research!
researches.resets: Resets upon the next reset tier.

upgradeDescriptions.offeringPotion: Erhalte umgehend Gaben im Wert von 2 Stunden (Echtzeit), abhängig von deiner Geschwindigkeit und besten Gaben/Sekunde!
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumPotion: Erhalte umgehend Obtainium im Wert von 2 Stunden (Echtzeit), abhängig von deiner Geschwindigkeit und besten Obtainium/Sekunde!
upgradeDescriptions.offeringEX: Erhalte +4% mehr Gaben aus allen Quellen!
upgradeDescriptions.offeringAuto: Fülle Runen automatisch mit Gaben. Das erste Level schaltet die Mechanik frei, and jedes weiter Level erhöht die erhaltenen Gabe um 2%. Jede Sekunde werden Gaben im Wert von 2^(Level) Runenleveln ausgegeben.
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumEX: Erhalte +4% mehr Obtainium aus allen Quellen!
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumAuto: Automatically pour Obtainium into a Research. 1st level unlocks feature, and each level increases Obtainium gain by 2%. Every Reincarnation, dump all Obtainium into Research until maxed.
upgradeDescriptions.instantChallenge: T and R Herausforderungen setzten sich bei Abschluss nicht zurück solange die automatische Wiederholung aktiv ist. Solange diese aktiv ist erhalte bis zu 10 Abschlüsse pro Sekunde. Außerdem erhälts du nach verlassen einer R Herausforderung automatisch die maximalen T Herausforderungsabschlüsse während diesem Aufstieg.
upgradeDescriptions.antSpeed: Each level gives a 1.2x speed multiplier to all Ant tiers' production! (Immaculate!) Short and simple.
upgradeDescriptions.cashGrab: Das hier ist Geldverschwendung, gibt aber ein paar hübsche Boni. Pro Level +1% Gaben und Obtainium.
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPass: Wow! Würfel machen dir ein Angebot: Kaufe diesen total fairen Season Pass und erhalte pro Level +2,25% Würfel und Tesserakte beim Aufstieg!
upgradeDescriptions.challengeExtension: Durch einen beeindruckenden Trick schaffst du es die maximalen Abschlüsse der Reinkarnationsherausforderungen pro Level um 2 zu erhöhen!
upgradeDescriptions.challengeTome: Die erweiterte Fassung: Dieses fünfte vergessene Band reduziert den Exponenten bei der Abschlussbedingung von Herausforderung 10 pro Level um weitere 20 Millionen. Bei mehr als 60 Abschlüssen von Herausforderung 9 oder 10 wird der Skalierungsfaktor ebenfalls um 1% pro Level reduziert.
upgradeDescriptions.cubeToQuark: Bekommst du kaum Quarks aus Würfeln? Dann kaufe das hier um für immer +50% Quarks aus dem Öffnen von Wow! Würfeln zu erhalten!
upgradeDescriptions.tesseractToQuark: Bekommst du kaum Quarks aus Tesserakten? Dann kaufe das hier um für immer +50% Quarks aus dem öffnen von Wow! Würfeln zu erhalten!
upgradeDescriptions.hypercubeToQuark: Bekommst du kaum Quarks aus Hyperwürfeln? Dann kaufe das hier um für immer +50% Quarks aus dem Öffnen von Wow! Würfeln zu erhalten!
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPass2: Fünffacher Preis, doppelter Spaß! +1.5% Wow! Hyperwürfel and Platonische Würfel pro Level.
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPass3: Ok, das ist einfach irre! +1.5% Wow! Hyperwürfel and Platonische Würfel pro Level.
upgradeDescriptions.chronometer: Diese Aufstiege sind irgendwie recht langsam. Warum gebe ich dir also nicht +1.2% Beschleunigung pro Level auf den Timer?
upgradeDescriptions.infiniteAscent: Okay, für eine exorbitante Menge, kannst du die 6. Rune bekommen. +35% Quarks und +125% von allen Würfeltypen auf maximaler Stufe!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator: Der PL-AT kann Additionen im Handumdrehen durchführen. Sonst aber leider nicht viel. +14% Quarks durch den Code 'add' pro Level. Das erste Level gibt dir die Lösung und das letzte Level erledigt es automatisch!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator2: Der PL-AT X hat einen verbesserten Speicher, der er dir ermöglicht pro Level 2 zusätzliche Nutzungen des 'add' Codes zu speichern. Das letzte Level sorgt dafür das 'add' zusätzlich 25% mehr Quarks gibt!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator3: Der PL-AT Ω ist großartigerweise mit etwas Unobtainium verstärkt! Er reduziert die Varianz der Quarks bei Nutzung des Codes 'add' um 10% pro Level, wodurch du mit größerer Wahrscheinlichkeit den maximalen Multiplikator bekommst. Zusätzlich hat es auch die Fähigkeit dir pro Level +60 Sekunden auf den Aufstiegstimer bei Nutzung des Codes zu geben.
upgradeDescriptions.calculator4: The PL-AT δ runs at 4,096Hz, which is a huge improvement over previous models. Reduce the interval between 'Add' code uses by 4% per level! Final level adds 32 additional capacity!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator5: Das PL-AT Γ Modell führt irgendwie noch 'stärkere' Berechnungen durch, was auch immer das bedeutet. Pro Level gibt's +6 Sekunden auf den GQ Export Timer. +1 Kapazität alle 10 Level und weitere +6 auf dem letzten Level!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator6: Das PL-AT _ Modell wurde von Derpsmith gebaut bevor er für immer aus der Taschenrechnerindustrie verbannt wurde. Erhalte 1 Sekunde der Okteraktproduktion pro Nutzung pro Level. Das letzte Level gibt 24 zusätzliche maximale Nutzungen!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator7: The PL-AT ΩΩ model was made by Derpsmith Ω, before he was banished from the industry forever. Gain 1 real-life second of Ambrosia Bar Points per usage per level. Final level grants 48 additional capacity!
upgradeDescriptions.constantEX: Der Händler hat noch ein Ass im Ärmel: Es kann zu extrem hohen Kosten dein zweites Konstantenupgrade leicht verbessern! Das Limit wird statt 10% (oder 11% mit Erfolgen) nochmal um 1% pro Level erhöht.
upgradeDescriptions.powderEX: Platonic selbst gibt dir pro Level eine 2% bessere Umwandlungsrate von Orbs des Überflusses zu Pulver. Wird aktiv, wenn Orbs verfallen.
upgradeDescriptions.chronometer2: Okay, in Ordnung. Hier sind weitere +0,6% Aufstiegsgeschwindigkeit pro Level, stapelt multiplikativ mit dem ersten Upgrade.
upgradeDescriptions.chronometer3: OKAY, IN ORDNUNG. Hier sind WEITERE +1,5% Aufstiegsgeschwindigkeit pro Level, stapelt wie immer multiplikativ.
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPassY: Das hier ist noch größerer Wahnsinn als das letzte, aber du wirst es trotzdem kaufen. Pro Level+0,75% von ALLEN Würfeln.
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPassZ: Dieses hier ist möglicherweise sehr gut. Erhalte pro Level +1% von ALLEN Würfeln pro Singularität!
upgradeDescriptions.challengeTome2: Du findest die letzten Seiten des verlorenen Bandes. Es funktioniert wie die anderen Seiten, aber du kannst bis zu 5 mehr haben!
upgradeDescriptions.instantChallenge2: Das Abschließen einer Ascension-Herausforderung führt nicht zu einem Reset (wenn die Wiederholung aktiviert ist) und du erhältst 1 weiteren Abschluss pro Tick pro Singularität.
upgradeDescriptions.cubeToQuarkAll: Erster Tagesordnungspunkt: +0,2% mehr Quarks pro Level für das Öffnen von Würfeln.
upgradeDescriptions.cashGrab2: Schlechter als das Original: +0,5% Gaben und Obtainium pro Level.
upgradeDescriptions.chronometerZ: +0,1% Aufstiegstempo pro Level und Singularität. Braucht aber viel Sprit zum Hochpowern.
upgradeDescriptions.offeringEX2: Erhalte +1% Offerings pro Stufe pro Singularität. Die Singularitäts-Debuff-Industrie ist damit aus dem Geschäft.
upgradeDescriptions.powderAuto: Deine Großeltern mussten einen ganzen Tag auf ihr Pulver warten, aber nicht du! Pro Stufe erhältst du +1% der Orbs in Pulver, basierend auf der Umwandlungsrate.
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPassLost: Davon sollte man besser die Finger lassen. +0,1% Okterakte pro Stufe, was auch immer das sein mag...
upgradeDescriptions.challenge15Auto: Deine Großeltern mussten Dimensionen verbiegen, um Challenge 15 Score zu bekommen, aber nicht du! Aktualisiert den Challenge 15 Exponenten jeden Tick während der Challenge 15!
upgradeDescriptions.extraWarp: "Hey, Alter, geh in das Portal, das ich letzte Nacht in meinem Schuppen gebaut habe!", sagte der Quacksalber
upgradeDescriptions.autoWarp: Verpasse der Warpmaschine einen Nachbrenner - mit der Macht der Quacks
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept: After 1,000 Quark Hepts, you gain +20% more Quarks every doubling! This, however, raises the entire reward by +0.01 power per level!
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept2: Want even stronger Quark Hepts? Gain +0.01 power per level to the Quark Hept Exponent!
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept3: You are probably asking why I would sell this to you instead of using it for myself. Well... here's +0.01 power per level!
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept4: +0.01 power per level... You know that 10^0.01 is about 1.023, right?
upgradeDescriptions.shopImprovedDaily: Hey du. Ja, du! Quarks machen Siegelhändler glücklich. Erhalte +5% mehr davon mit dem Code 'daily' pro Level.
upgradeDescriptions.shopImprovedDaily2: Erhalte bei Nutzung des 'daily'-Codes ein zusätzliches gratis Singularitäts-Upgrade und 20% mehr Quarks!
upgradeDescriptions.shopImprovedDaily3: Erhalte bei Nutzung des 'daily'-Codes ein zusätzliches gratis Singularitäts-Upgrade und 15% mehr Quarks!
upgradeDescriptions.shopImprovedDaily4: Erhalte bei Nutzung des 'daily'-Codes ein zusätzliches gratis Singularitäts-Upgrade und 100% mehr Quarks!
upgradeDescriptions.offeringEX3: [Supplied by - Infinity CO.] Gain 1.2% more Offerings per level, multiplicative! (Multiplier is 1.012^level). Every 25 levels, gain +1 Base Offering!
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumEX3: [Supplied by - Infinity CO.] Gain 1.2% more Obtainium per level, multiplicative! (Multiplier is 1.012^level). Every 25 levels, gain 6% more Immaculate Obtainium Multiplier! (1.06^[level/25])
upgradeDescriptions.chronometerInfinity: [Supplied by - Infinity CO.] Gain 0.6% more Ascension Speed per level, multiplicative! (Multiplier is 1.006^level). Every 40 levels, gain +0.001 spread on Ascension Speed exponent modifiers on speeds greater than or less than 1 (Check Stats for Nerds for this one)!
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPassInfinity: [Supplied by - Infinity CO.] Gain 1.2% more cubes per level, multiplicative! (Multiplier is 1.012^level). This effect is raised to the power of 1.25 for Octeract calculations!
upgradeDescriptions.shopSingularityPenaltyDebuff: Derpsmith war so stolz auf deine Leistung in der ersten EXALT, dass er deine Singularitätsdebuffs abschwächt. Für einen Preis. Einen großen Preis.
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumEX2: Erhalte+1% Obtainium pro Level pro Singularität!!!
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept5: [NOT Supplied by - Infinity CO.] Adds +0.01 Quark Hept Exponent per level. Platonic claims this is not from Infinity CO., but that might just be a cover.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaGeneration1: Buying this charm grants +1% more Ambrosia Bar Points per level, for more Ambrosia! Don't know what that means? You soon will.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaGeneration2: Newly fortified Obtainium Dust makes your charm more powerful, giving +1% more Ambrosia Bar Points per level, stacking multiplicatively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaGeneration3: It turns out adding more Obtainium Dust makes your charm more powerful, go figure. +1% more Ambrosia Bar Points per level, stacking multiplicatively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaGeneration4: What if you also added Quark Dust??? You will find out. +0.1% more Ambrosia Bar Points per level, stacking multiplicatively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuck1: Buying this charm grants +2 Ambrosia luck per level, for more Ambrosia! Don't know what that means? You soon will.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuck2: You get a slightly larger four leaf clover, giving +2 Ambrosia luck per level, stacking additively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuck3: You get a slightly greener four leaf clover, giving +2 Ambrosia luck per level, stacking additively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuck4: You get a slightly 'better' four leaf clover, what ever that means, giving +0.6 Ambrosia luck per level, stacking additively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopRedLuck1: A small, lesser dice from the tactician of gambling himself. +0.05 Red Luck per level. Every 20 levels, reduce the conversion ratio of Ambrosia Luck to Red Luck by 0.01.
upgradeDescriptions.shopRedLuck2: This one seems to have a heavy side. I wonder what that is about. +0.075 Red Luck per level. Every 20 levels, reduce the conversion ratio of Ambrosia Luck to Red Luck by 0.01.
upgradeDescriptions.shopRedLuck3: When you pick up this dice, it phases out of existence, then returns, the six face-up. +0.1 Red Luck per level. Every 20 levels, reduce the conversion ratio of Ambrosia Luck to Red Luck by 0.01.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuckMultiplier4: Gain +1% Ambrosia Luck per level! Simple as that.
upgradeDescriptions.shopOcteractAmbrosiaLuck: Gain +1 Ambrosia Luck per digit in your Wow! Octeract inventory per level. Simple as that.
upgradeDescriptions.shopCashGrabUltra: For a nominal price, gain up to +15% Ambrosia Bar Points, +120% Cubes and +8% Quarks per level based on Ambrosia, scaling nonlinearly until 10,000,000 lifetime earned.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaAccelerator: For each level of this Accelerator, reduce Ambrosia Bar Point requirements for Ambrosia generation by 0.4% per completion of EXALT 5 - No Ambrosia Upgrades.
upgradeDescriptions.shopEXUltra: With this EX Upgrade, every 1,000 owned Ambrosia adds +0.1% <<orchid|Obtainium>>, <<orange|Offerings>> and <<white|Cubes>>! This effect caps at 125,000 * (level of shop upgrade)!
upgradeDescriptions.shopChronometerS: With this upgrade, you gain +1% Ascension Speed and Global Speed per Singularity number above 200 your Singularity takes place!
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaUltra: For this absurdly expensive EX Upgrade, every EXALT completion grants +1 permanent Ambrosia Luck, per level.
upgradeDescriptions.shopSingularitySpeedup: You know all those time-gated Singularity and Octeract Upgrades? Now they accumulate 50 times faster! Thanks to this weird clock that somehow alters even <<gray | Singular Time>>...
upgradeDescriptions.shopSingularityPotency: You know all those free Singularity Upgrades? They are now 266% more effective (so, each is worth the equivalent to 3.66 levels, before softcaps). Why? This kinda weird <<gray | Singularity Transmission Ritual Device>>! Don't question it.
upgradeDescriptions.shopSadisticRune: What a weird rune; The shopkeeper (who you know no longer can see) says telepathically that it is an Infinite Ascent rune drenched in some <<gray | Singularity Matter>>. Were there other Ascents? Or maybe a <<gray | Descent?>>
upgradeDescriptions.shopInfiniteShopUpgrades: A Shop Voucher, printed on a blue tablet. Each grants +0.005 effective levels of the 'Infinity CO.' Quark shop upgrades, multiplied by the sum of your EXALT completions, all rounded down.
upgradeDescriptions.shopHorseShoe: Horse Shoes make good protection! Add 3 free levels of Horse Shoe rune, and each level of Horse Shoe rune decreases effects of Singularity Debuffs (except Salvage) by 0.1% per level additive (Max -30%)!

shop.header: Willkommen am Quark Markt. Du wirst nicht glauben, was alles zum Verkauf steht!
shop.refundable: This item is refundable! Will be set to level {{level}} when refunded.
shop.cannotRefund: Dieser Gegenstand kann NICHT rückerstattet werden! Sei vorsichtig.

upgradeEffects.cashGrab2: Du erhältst <<gold|{{amount}}%>> mehr Obtainium und Gaben! <<red|Halb>> so gut wie das Original.

shopSpecialOffer.name: Shop Special Offer
shopSpecialOffer.hasLevel2: Marktupgrades aus der Reinkarnations und Aufstiegsstufe behältst du nun dauerhaft!
shopSpecialOffer.hasLevel1: Du behältst dauerhaft 100 Level aller Marktupgrades in der ersten Reihe.
shopSpecialOffer.default: You startest jede Singularität mit 10 gratis Leveln von jedem Marktupgrade in der ersten Reihe.

potionAutogenerator.name: Potion Autogenerator
potionAutogenerator.default: Every 180 Seconds, automatically use one potion for Obtainium and Offerings! Interval reduced by 3% per singularity.

respecBeGone.name: Respec, be gone!
respecBeGone.default: Talismans now buff all runes at all times!

forTheLoveOfTheAntGod.name: For the love of (the Ant) God!
forTheLoveOfTheAntGod.hasLevel2: Du behältst dauerhaft die Ameisen-Autokäufer und beginnst jeden Aufstieg mit einer Stufe 8 Ameise.
forTheLoveOfTheAntGod.hasLevel1: Du behältst dauerhaft die Ameisen-Autokäufer und beginnst jeden Aufstieg mit einer Stufe 5 Ameise.
forTheLoveOfTheAntGod.default: Du behältst dauerhaft die Ameisen-Autokäufer und beginnst jeden Aufstieg mit einer Stufe 1 Ameise.

itAllAddsUp.name: It all adds up
itAllAddsUp.default: The 'Add' Special Action reward & cooldown is divided by {{div}} while its maximum capacity is multiplied the same amount! (Rounded Up).

automagicalRunes.name: Automagical Runes
automagicalRunes.hasLevel3: Runen-Autokäufer kaufen jetzt auch Segen, Geister, Talisman-Splitter, Fragmente and verbessern Unendlicher Aufstieg UND Antiquitäten des Ameisengottes
automagicalRunes.hasLevel2: Runen-Autokäufer kaufen jetzt auch Segen, Geister, Talisman-Splitter, Fragmente and verbessern Unendlicher Aufstieg
automagicalRunes.hasLevel1: Runen-Autokäufer kaufen jetzt auch Segen & Geister and verbessern Unendlicher Aufstieg
automagicalRunes.default: Runen-Autokäufer kaufen jetzt auch Segen und Geister

eternalAscensions.name: Eternal Ascensions
eternalAscensions.default: Unlock a new Real Time based Auto Ascension mode!

exaltedAchievements.name: Exalt Vault
exaltedAchievements.default: Unlocks new, very difficult challenges! They may only be entered by reaching high enough Singularities!

derpSmithsCornucopia.name: Derpsmith's Cornucopia
derpSmithsCornucopia.default: With blessing from the Derpsmith, every singularity grants +{{counter}}% more Octeracts!

coolQOLCubes.name: Cool QoL Cubes
coolQOLCubes.hasLevel1: Keep all Cube Opening Researches AND gain the ability to automatically open a percentage of your cubes each Ascension!
coolQOLCubes.default: Forschungen mit Bezug auf das Öffnen von Würfeln werden beim Aufstieg nicht mehr zurückgesetzt

irishAnt.name: Irish Ants
irishAnt.default: Ants blessed with the luck of the Irish grant <<limegreen|{{i}} Ambrosia Luck>>!

irishAnt2.name: Irish Ants II: Electric Boogaloo
irishAnt2.default: Ants blessed with more fortunate luck of the Irish increase base <<limegreen|Ambrosia Luck>> by <<limegreen|{{percent}}%>>! <<limegreen|+1%>> per perk level.

overclocked.name: Overclocked
overclocked.default: Level Caps on Certain Singularity Upgrades are increased by {{i}}!

wowCubeAutomatedShipping.name: Wow! Cube Automated Shipping
wowCubeAutomatedShipping.hasLevel1: Kaufe beim Aufstieg automatisch Würfel-Upgrades, egal wo du bist!
wowCubeAutomatedShipping.default: Kaufe beim Aufstieg automatisch Würfel-Upgrades, aber nur in Singularitäts-Herausforderungen.

congealedblueberries.name: Congealed Blueberries
congealedblueberries.default: Semisolid Blueberries act like normal Blueberries. Gain +{{i}} Blueberries which may be used in the Blueberry tree!

goldenRevolution.name: Golden Revolution
goldenRevolution.default: Singularity grants 0.4% more Golden Quarks per Singularity. Currently: +{{current}}% (MAX: +100%)

goldenRevolutionII.name: Golden Revolution II
goldenRevolutionII.default: Golden Quarks are 0.2% cheaper per Singularity. Currently: -{{current}}% (MAX: -50%)

goldenRevolutionIII.name: Golden Revolution III
goldenRevolutionIII.default: Export gives 2% more Golden Quarks per Singularity. Currently: +{{current}}% (MAX: +500%)

platonicClones.name: Clones of Platonic Clicking at Your Desktop
platonicClones.hasLevel1: Kaufe automatsch platonische Upgrades mit jedem Aufstieg, ohne dafür Obtainium oder Gaben auszugeben. Überall!
platonicClones.default: Kaufe automatisch platonische Upgrades mit jedem Aufstieg, ohne dafür Obtainium oder Gaben auszugeben. Aber nur in Singularität-Herausforderungen.

platSigma.name: PL-AT Σ
platSigma.default: The 'Add' Special Action refills {{counter}}% faster per level per Singularity. Currently: {{current}} (MAX: -60% Cooldown)

midasMilleniumAgedGold.name: Midas' Millennium-Aged Gold
midasMilleniumAgedGold.default: Every use of the 'Add' Special Action gives 0.01 free levels of GQ1 and 0.05 free levels of GQ3.

goldenRevolution4.name: Golden Revolution IV
goldenRevolution4.default: Every Octeract tick, convert 1 in {{gq}} GQ you would gain in this singularity to your balance automagically!

octeractMetagenesis.name: Octeract Metagenesis
octeractMetagenesis.hasLevel1: Gives free levels of Octeract Cogenesis AND Trigenesis based on your current free levels and purchased levels: (level * free / 640)^0.5, (level^2 * free/125000)^0.333 respectively
octeractMetagenesis.default: Gives free levels of Octeract Cogenesis based on your current free levels and purchased levels: (level * free / 1000)^0.5

immaculateAlchemy.name: Immaculate Alchemy
immaculateAlchemy.hasLevel2: Nach Singularität 200 funktioniert Zeitraffer nicht mehr! Stattdessen wird dein GQ Gewinn mit 8 multipliziert und deine GQ Kaufkosten durch 8 dividiert.
immaculateAlchemy.hasLevel1: Nach Singularität 200 funktioniert Zeitraffer nicht mehr! Stattdessen wird dein GQ Gewinn mit 5 multipliziert und deine GQ Kaufkosten durch 5 dividiert.
immaculateAlchemy.default:
Multiply Golden Quark gain and divide the cost to buy Golden Quarks by {{ multiplier }}!
This perk takes into account your current, not highest Singularity!
Thresholds: s50, s90, s130, s170, s200, s217, s235, s253, s271, s289

skrauQ.name: skrauQ
skrauQ.default:
Multiply all Quark Gain by (1 + (Singularity - 199)/25)^2. Currently: <>... Yes, it's <>.
<> This Perk takes into account your current Singularity count, and not your highest!

primalPower.name: Primal Power!
primalPower.hasLevel1: Gain awesome power by reaching Prime Numbered Singularities! Currently gaining: <<limegreen|+131>> & <<limegreen|+269 Ambrosia Luck>>!
primalPower.default: Gain awesome power by reaching Prime Numbered Singularities! Currently gaining: <<limegreen|+131 Ambrosia Luck>>!

permanentBenefaction.name: Permanent Benefaction
permanentBenefaction.default: <<lightblue | Pandora>> and <<orange | Vyshareth>> will always grant you their benefaction, so their cookies are correspondingly always eaten!

infiniteShopUpgrades.name: Orange Infinity Shop Voucher
infiniteShopUpgrades.default: Gain +0.5 effective levels of the 'Infinity CO.' Quark Shop upgrades per highest Singularity, minus 200, rounded down! Currently: {{amt}}
infiniteShopUpgrades.level2: Gain +0.8 effective levels of the 'Infinity CO.' Quark Shop upgrades per highest Singularity, minus 200, rounded down! Currently: {{amt}}

recycledContent.name: ... Recycled Content?
recycledContent.default: Increase your <<green|Salvage>> by 5 per tier! Currently: +{{amount}}

infiniteRecycling.name: Infinite Recycling
infiniteRecycling.default: Your Infinite Ascent Rune gains a third perk: +0.025 <<green|Salvage>> per level, per tier! Currently: +{{salvage}}

recyclistsDesktop.name: Recyclists Clicking at Your Desktop
recyclistsDesktop.default: For all sources of <<crimson|Negative Salvage>>, they reduce it by {{i}}% less!

demeterHarvest.name: Demeter's Harvest
demeterHarvest.default: For all sources of <<lime|Positive Salvage>>, they increase it by {{i}}% more!

toString.noMinimum: Keine minimale Menge an Singularitäten zum Kaufen erforderlich
toString.costNextLevel: Cost for next level: {{amount}} Golden Quarks

goldenQuarks1.name: Goldene Quarks I
goldenQuarks1.description: In the future, you will gain 10% more Golden Quarks on Singularities per level!
goldenQuarks1.effect: Permanently gain {{n}} more Golden Quarks on Singularities.

goldenQuarks2.name: Goldene Quarks II
goldenQuarks2.description: GQ zu kaufen ist 0,2% billiger pro Level! [Nach 50% wächst der Effekt viel langsamer]
goldenQuarks2.effect: Golden Quarks im Markt zu kaufen ist {{n}}% günstiger.

goldenQuarks3.name: Goldene Quarks III
goldenQuarks3.description: Wenn du das kaufst, wirst du Goldenes Quark pro Stunde von Exports kriegen. Hochleveln gibt dir extra (level) pro Stunde!
goldenQuarks3.effect: Jede Stunde, kriegst du {{n}} Goldenes Quarks von Exports.

starterPack.name: Anfänger-Paket
starterPack.description: Buy this! Buy This! Cube gain is permanently multiplied by 5, and gain 6x the Immaculate Obtainium and Offerings from all sources.
starterPack.effectHave: You have unlocked a 5x multiplier to Cubes and 6x multiplier to Immaculate Obtainium and Offerings.
starterPack.effectHaveNot: You have not unlocked a 5x multiplier to Cubes and 6x multiplier to Immaculate Obtainium and Offerings.

wowPass.name: Markt Aktionsware
wowPass.description: This upgrade will convince the Seal Merchant to sell you more cool stuff, which even persist on Singularity!
wowPass.effectHaveNot: Du hast den Shop-Bonanza noch nicht freigeschaltet.

cookies.name: Keks-Rezepte I
cookies.description: Für ein paar Goldene Quarks, eröffne Wow! Bäckerei, fügt fünf Keks relevante Würfel Upgrades hinzu.
cookies.effectHave: Du hast Band 1 des Rezeptbuchs freigeschaltet.
cookies.effectHaveNot: Du hast Band 1 des Rezeptbuchs noch nicht freigeschaltet.

cookies2.name: Keks-Rezepte II
cookies2.description: Diversify Wow! Bakery into cooking slightly more exotic cookies, adding five more cookie-related Cube upgrades.
cookies2.effectHave: You have unlocked volume 2 of the recipe book.
cookies2.effectHaveNot: You have not unlocked volume 2 of the recipe book.

cookies3.name: Keks-Rezepte III
cookies3.description: Your bakers threaten to quit without a higher pay. If you do pay them, they will bake even more fancy cookies.
cookies3.effectHave: You have appeased the union of Bakers.
cookies3.effectHaveNot: You have not appeased the union of Bakers.

cookies4.name: Keks-Rezepte IV
cookies4.description: Dies ist ein kleiner Preis für Erlösung.
cookies4.effectHave: Du hast den Preis für die Erlösung bezahlt.
cookies4.effectHaveNot: You have not paid your price for salvation.

cookies5.name: Cookie Recipes V
cookies5.description: The worst atrocity a man can commit is witnessing, without anguish, the suffering of others.
cookies5.effectHave: Sie haben das Leiden der Massen bezeugt.
cookies5.effectHaveNot: Sie haben das Leiden der Massen nicht bezeugt.

ascensions.name: Verbesserte Belohnungen beim Aufstieg
ascensions.description: Wenn du dies kaufst, erhältst du +2% Aufstiegspunkte pro Stufe! Alle 10 Stufen gewähren dir zusätzlich, multiplikativ +1% mehr Aufstiegspunkte.

corruptionFourteen.name: Stufe Vierzehn Korruptionen
corruptionFourteen.description: Buy this to unlock level fourteen Corruptions. :)
corruptionFourteen.effectHave: You have gained the ability to use level 14 Corruptions. {{m}}
corruptionFourteen.effectHaveNot: You have not gained the ability to use level 14 Corruptions. {{m}}

corruptionFifteen.name: Level Fünfzehn Korruptionen
corruptionFifteen.description: This doesn't *really* raise the Corruption limit. Rather, it adds one FREE level to Corruption multipliers, no matter what (can exceed cap). :)
corruptionFifteen.effectHave: You have gained a free Corruption level. {{m}}
corruptionFifteen.effectHaveNot: You have not gained a free Corruption level. {{m}}

singOfferings1.name: Offering Charge
singOfferings1.description: Upgrade this to get +2% Offerings per level, forever!

singOfferings2.name: Offering Sturm
singOfferings2.description: Apparently, you can use this bar to attract more Offerings. +8% per level, to be precise.

singOfferings3.name: Offering Tempest
singOfferings3.description: This bar is so pristine, it'll make anyone submit their Offerings. +4% per level, to be precise.

singObtainium1.name: Obtainium-Welle
singObtainium1.description: Verbessere dies, um +2% Obtainium pro Level zu erhalten, für immer!

singObtainium2.name: Obtainium-Flut
singObtainium2.description: Holy crap, water bending! +8% gained Obtainium per level.

singObtainium3.name: Obtainium-Tsunami
singObtainium3.description: Eine steigende Flut hebt alle Boote. +4% mehr Obtainium pro Level.

singCubes1.name: Würfel-Flamme
singCubes1.description: Upgrade this to get +0.6% Cubes per level, forever!

singCubes2.name: Würfel-Brand
singCubes2.description: Verbrenne einige weitere goldene Quarks! +8% mehr Würfel pro Stufe.

singCubes3.name: Würfel-Inferno
singCubes3.description: Sogar Dante ist beeindruckt: +4% mehr Würfel pro Stufe.

singCitadel.name: Zitadelle der Singularität
singCitadel.description: What a unique structural phenomenon... but it gives +2% Obtainium, Offerings, and 3-7D cubes per level! +1% Additional for every 10 levels!

singCitadel2.name: Zitadelle der 'Singularität': Die wahre Edition
singCitadel2.description: This actual Citadel gives +2% Obtainium, Offerings, and 3-7D cubes per level! +1% Additional for every 10 levels! Also sets the free level of the fake citadel to whatever level this is.

octeractUnlock.name: Okterakte
octeractUnlock.description: MOMENT MAL!!! Was willst du damit erreichen?!?
octeractUnlock.effectHave: Du hast den Okterakt Hype gekauft.
octeractUnlock.effectHaveNot: You have not bought into the Octeract hype.

singOcteractPatreonBonus.name: Platonic $ells out!!!
singOcteractPatreonBonus.description: Du weißt vom Patreon-Bonus? Der ist ja auch cool und so, aber was wäre, wenn er auch die Okterakt-Produktion um den gleichen Betrag erhöhen würde?
singOcteractPatreonBonus.effect: Octeract production is {{n}} faster for every $10 per month on the Patreon! Same as the Quark bonus which already exists.

offeringAutomatic.name: Blueberry Shards!
offeringAutomatic.description:
Die Legenden sind wahr.
Die Prophezeiungen wurden erfüllt.
Der Ameisengott hat deine Gebete erhört.
Es soll Blaubeeren geben!
Und sie waren gut.

intermediatePack.name: Mittleres Paket
intermediatePack.description: Double Global Speed, Multiply Ascension Speed by 1.5, and gain +2% Quarks forever. Yum... 2% Quark Milk.
intermediatePack.effectHave: Du hast dein Paket zum mittleren Paket aufgewertet.
intermediatePack.effectHaveNot: Du hast dein Paket nicht zum mittleren Paket aufgewertet.

advancedPack.name: Fortgeschrittenes Paket
advancedPack.description: Now we're cooking with kerosene! Gain +4% Quarks, additive with intermediate pack, +0.33 to all Corruption score multipliers, regardless of level!
advancedPack.effectHave: Sie haben unser fortgeschrittenes Paket gekauft.
advancedPack.effectHaveNot: Sie haben unser fortgeschrittenes Paket nicht gekauft.

expertPack.name: Expertenpaket
expertPack.description: That's a handful! Gain +6% Quarks, additive with other packs, 1.5x Ascension Score, Code 'add' gives 1.2x Ascension Timer.
expertPack.effectHaveNot: Sie sind nicht zum Experten-Anbieter gewechselt.

masterPack.name: Meister-Paket
masterPack.description: A tad insane. Gain +8% Quarks, additive with other packs, for every level 14 Corruption, Ascension Score is multiplied by 1.1.
masterPack.effectHave: Du hast deine inneren Chakras gemeistert.
masterPack.effectHaveNot: Du hast deine inneren Chakras nicht gemeistert.

divinePack.name: Göttliches Paket
divinePack.description: OHHHHH. Gain +10% Quarks, additive with other packs, and multiply Octeract gain by 1.25 for each Corruption at level 14 or higher (1.3 for >=15 and 1.4 for >=16)!
divinePack.effectHave: You have found the reason for existence. Current Octeract Bonus: +{{n}}
divinePack.effectHaveNot: Du hast den Grund für die Existenz nicht gefunden.

wowPass2.name: Markt-Räumungsverkauf
wowPass2.description: The Seal Merchant needs to get rid of some exotic goods. Only for a steep price. I do not think that is how sales work.
wowPass2.effectHave: Sie haben das Liquidation Event ausgelöst!
wowPass2.effectHaveNot: Sie haben das Liquidation Event nicht ausgelöst!

wowPass3.name: QUAAAAKK
wowPass3.description: QUAAAAAAAAACK. Der Händler ist für deine QUARKS verrückt geworden!
wowPass3.effectHaveNot: Sie haben die QUACKSTRAVAGANZA nicht ausgelöst!!

potionBuff.name: Potion Decanter of Enlightenment
potionBuff.description: Dieser Gegenstand soll eigentlich die Quelle der Jugend sein, er verstärkt Tränke erheblich!

potionBuff2.name: Potion Decanter of Inquisition
potionBuff2.description: Beim Anblick des Glases bist du dir nicht wirklich sicher, was dieser Trank ist.

potionBuff3.name: Potion Decanter of Maddening Instability
potionBuff3.description: SHE'S GONNA BLOW!!!! Said Midas, the Golden Quark Salesman.

singChallengeExtension.name: Höhere Challenge-Caps
singChallengeExtension.description: Need more Challenges? Well, add 2 more Reincarnation Challenges and 1 Ascension Challenge to the cap, per level.
singChallengeExtension.effect: Du fühlst dich motiviert genug, um {{n}} weitere Reinkarnations-Herausforderungen abzuschließen und {{m}} weitere Aufstiegs-Herausforderungen.

singChallengeExtension2.name: Höherere Challenge-Caps
singChallengeExtension2.description: Need even more Challenges? Well, add 2 more Reincarnation Challenges and 1 Ascension Challenge to the cap, per level.
singChallengeExtension2.effect: Du fühlst dich motiviert genug, um {{n}} weitere Reinkarnations-Herausforderungen abzuschließen und {{m}} weitere Aufstiegs-Herausforderungen.

singChallengeExtension3.name: HöherereRE Challenge-Caps
singChallengeExtension3.description: Need even MORE Challenges? Well, add 2 more Reincarnation Challenges and 1 Ascension Challenge to the cap, per level. Does it not seem excessive?
singChallengeExtension3.effect: Du fühlst dich motiviert genug, um {{n}} weitere Reinkarnations-Herausforderungen abzuschließen und {{m}} weitere Aufstiegs-Herausforderungen.

singQuarkImprover1.name: Marginales Quark Einkommen Verbesserer Ding
singQuarkImprover1.description: A doohickey that I forgot what it looked like. +0.5% Quarks per level, multiplicative with all other bonuses! Seems like it grows in cost a lot faster than anything else though. Also, did you know these descriptions can be arbitrarily long?

singQuarkHepteract.name: I wish my Quark Hepteract was marginally better.
singQuarkHepteract.description: Wrong game, oops. Anyway, would you like more exponent on your Quark Hepteract. +0.02 per level, to be precise.

singQuarkHepteract2.name: I wish my Quark Hepteract was marginally better II.
singQuarkHepteract2.description: Still not the right game. Same as the previous upgrade.

singQuarkHepteract3.name: I wish my Quark Hepteract was marginally better III.
singQuarkHepteract3.description: I AM NOT THE GODMOTHER YOU ARE LOOKING FOR! This wish is weaker... but it can be overclocked.

singOcteractGain.name: Octeract Absinthe
singOcteractGain.description: You would have never known this tonic can boost your Octeracts! [+1.25% per level, in fact!]

singOcteractGain2.name: Pieces of Eight
singOcteractGain2.description: There is indeed eight of them, but each only gives +0.625% bonus, so each level gives +5% Octeract per level.

singOcteractGain3.name: The Obelisk Shaped like an Octagon.
singOcteractGain3.description: Platonic had to reach pretty far here. +2.5% Octeracts yeah!

singOcteractGain5.name: Das achte Wunder der Welt
singOcteractGain5.description: is the wonder of the world we live in. +1% Octeracts per level.

platonicTau.name: Platonic TAU
platonicTau.description: In die falsche Upgrade-Sektion platziert, das wird alle Beschränkungen bezüglich Corruptions oder Corruption Level entfernen! Auch erhöhte 3d Würfel Produktion um den Exponent 1,01!

platonicAlpha.name: Platonic ALPHA...?
platonicAlpha.description: Confusion ensues as to why there are two of these. This one is capitalized, so buying this ensures Platonic Alpha is always maxed!

platonicDelta.name: Platonic DELTA
platonicDelta.description: Time follows you towards the future, after getting this bad boy. Gain +100% more Cubes per day in your current singularity, up to +900% at day 9.

platonicPhi.name: Platonic PHI
platonicPhi.description: Time follows you toward the past as well. Gain 5 additional free Singularity Upgrades per day in your singularity from code 'daily', up to +50 after 10 days.

singFastForward.name: Etherflux-Singularitäten
singFastForward.description: Golden Quark gained by Singularity is increased by 2.5% (additive), and lets you 'look ahead' an extra Singularity. This means you can choose (from the Elevator) to skip a Singularity if you do one at your all time highest!

singFastForward2.name: Aetherflux Singularities
singFastForward2.description: Golden Quark gained by Singularity is increased by 2.5% (additive) and lets you 'look ahead' yet another Singularity!

singAscensionSpeed.name: A hecking good Ascension speedup!
singAscensionSpeed.description: Ascension Speed is raised to the power of 1.03, raised to 0.97 if less than 1x.

singAscensionSpeed2.name: Ascended Ascension Speedup!
singAscensionSpeed2.description: The first upgrade gave 0.03 of what we in the business call 'exponent spread'. This adds +0.001 per level!

ultimatePen.name: Der ultimative Stift
ultimatePen.description: Du. Du bist der Autor deiner eigenen Geschichte!
ultimatePen.effect: You do {{n}} own the Ultimate Pen. {{m}}

halfMind.name: HALF MIND
halfMind.description: A note, you found on the 'ground': seems like an advertisement for a cult. "Lock your global speed to 10x, and multiply all obtainium and offerings based on the difference." Hmm...

oneMind.name: ONE MIND
oneMind.description: The Cult Master, in his third eye, stares into your brain. "Hmm. You need the other half. For a heavy tithe, let me extend the benefits of the MIND to your Ascension Speed for Cubes as well." Hmm indeed...
oneMind.effectHaveNot: Du bist dem Kult nicht beigetreten!

wowPass4.name: QUQUQUQUAAKCKCKKCKKCKK
wowPass4.description: Deals that'll cost you a beak and a wing!
wowPass4.effectHave: You have quacked your last QUARK
wowPass4.effectHaveNot: You haven't quacked your last QUARK

blueberries.name: Blueberries!
blueberries.description: Blueberries! They are rich in Vitamin K, which helps clot things, including Ambrosia!

singAmbrosiaLuck2.name: Vergoldete Beeren des Glücks
singAmbrosiaLuck2.description: Literally put some gold onto 'berries' and become lucky. +2 Ambrosia Luck per level!

singAmbrosiaLuck3.name: Dedizierte Goldschmelze
singAmbrosiaLuck3.description: More gold is dipped onto each berry. +3 Ambrosia Luck per level!

singAmbrosiaLuck.name: Absolute Hot
singAmbrosiaLuck.description: Your gold smelters get arbitrarily close to 'Absolute Hot'. +4 Ambrosia Luck per level, infinitely levelable!

singAmbrosiaLuck4.name: The Alchemists from the Beginning of the Game Work for your Golden Berry Needs
singAmbrosiaLuck4.description: Yeah, these upgrade titles can be arbitrarily long, too. +5 Ambrosia Luck per level!

singAmbrosiaGeneration2.name: Hourglass of Importance
singAmbrosiaGeneration2.description: A somewhat important hourglass which somehow grants +1% faster Ambrosia Bar Point creation per level...
singAmbrosiaGeneration2.effect: Ambrosia Bar Point creation is +{{n}}% faster!

singAmbrosiaGeneration3.name: Hourglass of Significance
singAmbrosiaGeneration3.description: An hourglass which is still important, perhaps even more so. +1% faster Ambrosia Bar Point creation per level.
singAmbrosiaGeneration3.effect: Ambrosia Bar Point creation is +{{n}}% faster!

singAmbrosiaGeneration.name: Stundenglas der Limitlosigkeit
singAmbrosiaGeneration.description: Remember- this hourglass is really important. But it gives +1% faster Ambrosia Bar Point creation per level and is infinitely levelable!
singAmbrosiaGeneration.effect: Ambrosia Bar Point creation is +{{n}}% faster!

singAmbrosiaGeneration4.name: Stundenglas der Fantasie
singAmbrosiaGeneration4.description: An hourglass which is unimportant and 'less timely'- whatever that means. +2% faster Ambrosia Bar Point creation per level.
singAmbrosiaGeneration4.effect: Ambrosia Bar Point creation is +{{n}}% faster!

singBonusTokens1.name: Spare Change on the Sofa Cushion
singBonusTokens1.description: Thanks to your perceptive eyes, you find more Tokens in Campaigns! +1 per level per Campaign with at least 1 completion.
singBonusTokens1.effect: You find {{n}} more Tokens from first clears in Campaigns!

singBonusTokens2.name: Spare Change in the creases of the Sofa Cushions
singBonusTokens2.description: Thanks to your more perceptive eyes, you find even more Tokens in Campaigns! +1% more Tokens per level from Campaigns.
singBonusTokens2.effect: You find +{{n}}% more Tokens from Campaigns!

singBonusTokens3.name: Spare Change under the Sofa
singBonusTokens3.description: Why do you have Tokens just lying everywhere near your Sofa? +2 per level per Campaign with maxxed completions.
singBonusTokens3.effect: You find {{n}} more Tokens from maxxed Campaigns!

singBonusTokens4.name: Spare Change from the Ant God's Coffers
singBonusTokens4.description: Those Tokens were too big to be called Tokens. Too big, too thick, too heavy, and too rough, they were more like large hunks of gold. +5 Tokens at the start of a Singularity per level.
singBonusTokens4.effect: Ant God ponies up {{n}} Tokens at the start of a Singularity!

singInfiniteShopUpgrades.name: Yellow Infinity Shop Voucher
singInfiniteShopUpgrades.description: A Shop Voucher, printed on a yellow tablet. Each grants +1 effective level of the 'Infinity CO.' Quark Shop upgrades.
singInfiniteShopUpgrades.effect: You own {{n}} Yellow Infinity Shop Vouchers!

singTalismanBonusRunes1.name: Talisman Buff!

updateAlerts.june282021: 28. Juni. 2021: V2.5.3. Du hast deine Quarks von den Taschenrechnern wiedergekriegt, wenn du welche gekauft hattest. Diese sind nicht länger zurücksetzbar, also sei vorsichtig!
updateAlerts.july22021: 2. Juli. 2021: V. 2.5.5. Du hast deine Quarks von dem Powder EX Upgrade wiedergekriegt, wenn du welche gekauft hast. Auch deine T1 Ameisen wurden zurückgesetzt und die Grundkosten auf 1e700 Partikel gesetzt. Powder EX ist nicht länger zurücksetzbar, also sei vorsichtig!
updateAlerts.sing230Balancing: Aufgrund von Balance Veränderung, wurdest du zu Singularity 230 zurückgesetzt, um dein Speicherstand vor Softlocking zu schützen!

updateAlerts.v297hotfix1Sing: Du wurdest in die Version 2.9.7 Hotfix 1 geladen! Deine unbegrenzten Singularity Upgrades wurden zurückerstattet! Entschuldung für die Unannehmlichkeiten.

descriptions.1: Erhöhe die Produktion der Arbeiter mit jedem gekauften Produzenten.
descriptions.2: Increase production of Investments per producer bought.
descriptions.3: Increase production of Printers per producer bought.
descriptions.4: Increase production of Mints per producer bought.
descriptions.5: Increase production of Alchemies per producer bought.
descriptions.6: Increase all production based on producer bought.
descriptions.7: Gain free multipliers based on your purchased Alchemies.
descriptions.8: Gain 1 free Accelerator per 7 purchased Multipliers.
descriptions.9: Gain 1 free Multiplier per 10 purchased Accelerators.
descriptions.10: Verbessere Arbeiter basierend auf den ersten 750 gekauften Kapitalanlagen.
descriptions.11: Accelerators improve generation production by 2% each.
descriptions.12: Each Prestige multiplies production by 1.01, multiplicatively (Max: 1e4x).
descriptions.13: Augments buff the production of Investments.
descriptions.14: Free Accelerators buff generation of Printers.
descriptions.15: Free Accelerators buff generation of Mints.
descriptions.18: Multiply Printer production based on Mythos Shards.
descriptions.19: Multiply Investment production based on Mythos.
descriptions.20: Coin upgrade 1 is raised to the eleventh power.
descriptions.21: Gain 1 Multiplier and 5 Accelerators plus 1% more free Multipliers/Accelerators.
descriptions.22: Gain 1 Multiplier and 4 Accelerators plus 1% more free Multipliers/Accelerators.
descriptions.23: Gain 1 Multiplier and 3 Accelerators plus 1% more free Multipliers/Accelerators.
descriptions.24: Gain 1 Multiplier and 2 Accelerators plus 1% more free Multipliers/Accelerators.
descriptions.25: Gain 1 Multiplier and 1 Accelerators plus 1% more free Multipliers/Accelerators.
descriptions.27: Gain free levels of Speed Rune based on unspent Coins. (Max: +100)
descriptions.28: Gain a free level of Duplication Rune per 400 Coin producers bought. (Max: +100)
descriptions.29: Gain a free level of Speed Rune per 400 Coin producers bought. (Max: +100)
descriptions.30: Gain free levels of Duplication Rune based on unspent Coins. (Max: +100)
descriptions.31: Gain 1 free Accelerator Boost per 2,000 Coin producers bought.
descriptions.32: Gain free Accelerators based on Unspent Diamonds.
descriptions.33: Gain 1 free Multiplier for each Accelerator Boost owned.
descriptions.36: Multiply Crystal production by Diamonds, maximum 1e5000x.
descriptions.37: Multiply Mythos Shard production by the squared logarithm of Diamonds.
descriptions.38: Gain +20% more Offerings thanks to generous Discord Server Boosters!
descriptions.39: Gain +60% more Ant Speed thanks to generous Discord Server Boosters!
descriptions.40: Gain +25% more Ant Sacrifice rewards thanks to generous Discord Server Boosters!
descriptions.41: Multiply production based on unspent Mythos.
descriptions.42: Multiply Mythos Shard production based on unspent Diamonds.
descriptions.43: Multiply coin production by 1.01 per Transcension (Max: 1e30x).
descriptions.44: Multiply Mythos gain on Transcend by 1.01 per Transcension (Max: 1e6x).
descriptions.45: Kriege gratis Beschleuniger basierend auf Mythos Scherben.
descriptions.46: Beschleuniger Boosts sind 5% besser und resetten keine Prestigefeatures.
descriptions.47: Multipliziert deine Mythos-Scherben Produktion basierend auf deine EP.
descriptions.48: Multipliziert Produktion basierend auf gekaufte Beschleuniger und Multiplizierer.
descriptions.49: Erhalte gratis Multiplikator basierend auf gehaltenen Mythos.
descriptions.50: Erhalte +25% gratis Beschleuniger und Multiplizierer, aber NUR während einer Challenge.
descriptions.51: Erhöht Produktion von allen Mythos Gebäuden basieren auf gekauften Beschleuniger Boosts.
descriptions.53: Augments produce more Shards based on Acceleration Multiplier.
descriptions.54: Wizards produce more Enchantments based on Multiplier.
descriptions.55: Grandmasters produce more Oracles based on Building power.
descriptions.59: Coin Mint production is multiplied by 1e+25000.
descriptions.61: Welcome to Reincarnation! +7 Salvage to get you started.
descriptions.62: Gain +0.02 Base Offerings per Challenge Completion! (Max: +12)
descriptions.63: Kristall Produktion ist multipliziert basierend auf Partikel zu der 6. Potenz [Capped bei 1e6000x].
descriptions.64: Mythos Scherben Produktion ist multipliziert bei deinen Partikeln zum Quadrat.
descriptions.65: Multipliziert den Erhalt von Partikel von Reinkarnation bei 5x!
descriptions.66: Add +2 to the Rune Coefficient of the first five Runes. Reduce how many offerings you need to level up your Runes!
descriptions.67: Atom gain is increased by 3% per Particle producer purchased!
descriptions.68: Kriege ein gratis Multiplizierer für jede 1e1000x Erhöhung in Steuern.
descriptions.69: Krieg mehr Obtanium basierend auf dein Partikel Gewinn. [Funktioniert mit der Automation mit deiner reduzierten Rate!]
descriptions.70: Die Zeit scheint +0.333*log10(MAX Obtainium +1)% schneller zu gehen, wenn du das kaufst.
descriptions.71: Runen erhalten zusätzliche EXP (Rune Level/25) pro genutztem Offering.
descriptions.72: Obtanium Gewinn von Reinkarnation ist multipliziert (1+ 2C) wobei C geschaffte #Reinkarnation Challenges sind und das bis zu 50x!
descriptions.73: Kriege +100% gratis Beschleuniger Boosts und +10 gratis Kristall Upgrade Levels, aber nur in Reinkarnation Challenges.
descriptions.74: Obtainium gain is increased based on highest ever unspent Offerings. [Max: 100,000 Offerings]
descriptions.75: Erhalte mehr Offering basierend auf der höchsten Zahl an jemals gehaltenen Obtanium. [Max: 30.000.000 Obtainium]
descriptions.76: Ant generation kinda slow? I agree! Multiply Ant Speed by 5.
descriptions.77: This is Synergism, right? Let's make each purchased Ant multiply Ant Speed by 1.004.
descriptions.78: Gain an Ant speed multiplier! x(1 + 0.005 * (log10(MAX Offerings + 1))^2) Ant Speed, to be precise.
descriptions.79: The Ant God will accept an arbitrary number of Particles in order to give you 10% more rewards from Ant Sacrifice.
descriptions.80: Der Ameisen Gott akzeptiert eine willkürlich größere Summe von Partikeln um dir mehr Ameisen ELO zu geben.
descriptions.88: Kaufe automatisch Beschleuniger Boosts wenn bezahlbar.
descriptions.93: Erzeugt 1% des Diamantengewinns aus durchführen eines Prestige pro Sekunde.
descriptions.99: Automatically buy Mythos Upgrades if affordable.
descriptions.100: Generate 1% of Mythos Gain from transcending per second.
descriptions.106: Raffinerien produzieren Alchemisten nach der Formel Raffinerien^0.10.
descriptions.107: Raffinerien -> Alchemisten-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.10 auf 0.25.
descriptions.108: Raffinerien -> Alchemisten-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.25 auf 0.50.
descriptions.109: Raffinerien -> Alchemisten-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.50 auf 0.75.
descriptions.110: Raffinerien -> Alchemisten-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.75 auf 1.
descriptions.111: Verstärker produzieren Pandora-Boden nach der Formel Verstärker^0.08.
descriptions.112: Verstärker -> Pandora-Box-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.08 auf 0.16.
descriptions.113: Verstärker -> Pandora-Box-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.16 auf 0.24.
descriptions.114: Verstärker -> Pandora-Box-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.24 auf 0.32.
descriptions.115: Verstärker -> Pandora-Box-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.32 auf 0.40.
descriptions.116: Protone produzieren Großmeister nach der Formel Protone^0.05.
descriptions.117: Protonen -> Großmeister-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.05 auf 0.10.
descriptions.118: Protonen -> Großmeister-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.10 auf 0.15.
descriptions.119: Protonen -> Großmeister-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.15 auf 0.20.
descriptions.120: Protonen -> Großmeister-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.20 auf 0.25.
descriptions.121: Das wurde vermutlich schon automatisch gekauft. -50% Steuern!
descriptions.122: Die Obergrenze vom dritten Kristall-Upgrade erhöht sich von +12% auf +100%!
descriptions.123: Erhöhe die Münzproduktion um die Potenz 1.025. Mehr EXPONENTEN.
descriptions.125: Der konstante Steuerdivisor erhöht sich um 0.333% pro abgschlossener Herausforderung 10. [Divisor^(1 + Upgrade)]

crystalUpgrades.2: Erhalte mehr Kristalle, umso mehr Münzen du hast, pro Level.
crystalUpgrades.3: Jeder gekaufte Kristallproduzent erhöht die Generierung von Kristallproduzenten um 0.1% pro Level. [MAX: {{max}}%]
crystalUpgrades.4: Verbessert den Multiplikator auf die Münzproduktion um den Exponent 0.05 pro Level. [MAX: +{{max}}]
crystalUpgrades.5: Jede abgeschlossene Transzendenz-Herausforderung erhöht die Kristallproduktion um 1% pro Level.

constantUpgrades.3: Erhöht die erhaltenen Opfergaben um +2% pro Level.
constantUpgrades.6: Add +2 free Ant Levels per level.
constantUpgrades.7: Provides 7 free rune levels per level, up to +7,000.
constantUpgrades.8: Erhöhe die Runen-EXP aus Opfergaben um 10% pro Level [Additive]
constantUpgrades.9: When bought, Rune Power is increased by Log4(Talisman Shards +1) %
constantUpgrades.10: When bought, gain Log4(Constant + 1)% more Wow! Cubes and Tesseracts on Ascension.
